Class Jonas.Logic.Substitution

java.lang.Object
Jonas.Logic.Substitution
public class Jonas.Logic.Substitution extends Object
A set of substitutions.

    Constructs an empty set of substitutions.

    Constructs a set of substitutions with a single sub.

    • composition

      public static Jonas.Logic.Substitution composition(Jonas.Logic.Substitution subs1, Jonas.Logic.Substitution subs2)
      Creates a new substitution based upon two substitutions.
      Parameters:
      subs1 - the first substitution.
      subs2 - the second substitution.
      Returns:
      the composition of the two substitutions.

    • getSubstitution

      public Jonas.Logic.Term getSubstitution(Jonas.Logic.Variable var)
      Returns the term that a variable is substituted into. Null if the variable is not substituted.
      Parameters:
      var - variable for which its substitution is searched for.
      Returns:
      the term var is substituted into or null if no substitution of var is in this list of substitutions.
